meta_description:
From its humble beginnings, the telephone 
has shaped the modern world in too 
many ways to count. 

At the New Hampshire Telephone Museum, 
you can see the evolution of the world's 
greatest invention, experience life as a 
switchboard operator and learn

##  New Hampshire Telephone Museum 

NHTM has been selected for another round of charitable gaming nights at the REVO CASINO and SOCIAL HOUSE located in Keene, NH.  
  
These funds are critical to our mission. As you may know, NHTM has had an amazing few years. We have been able to reach so many students and seniors centers - teaching them all about communications and have a blast while doing it!

* * *

* * *

[ Calendar of Events ](/calendar-of-events.html)

# Hours of Enjoyment

November & December - Tuesdays 10 to 4 _and**​**_ Saturdays 10 to 2   
**​January & February - Fridays 10 to 4  _and​_ Saturdays 10 to 2.**  
March & April - ...
